title: Neroli Organic Juice Bar and Rawfood Diner
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Offers a menu of drinks and food which are 100% vegan, some raw, and mostly organic. Find green juices and smoothies, almond milk shakes, raw soups, acai-granola bowl, wheatgrass shots, raw desserts, kale salad, tabouleh-falafel platter, sandwiches, and veggie sushi. Moved to this space in 2014 from Shabazi St.
